name: NO MORE FUN After Space Parties
name_original: NO MORE FUN After Space Parties
description:
Who has never dream of playing a simulator who lets you embody a party animal who should tidy up his apartment after a big evening after?

…

Nobody ?

Well, that would still be nice of you to give Thenny a hand to tidy up the Triton X3000 (her good ol’ starship), until its last update ends.

NO MORE FUN After Space Partys, is a short narrative game.

__

This game was made by Pierre (Zwumyn25) and Rémi (Kreaki).

We worked on the concept and game design together. Pierre programmed the game, wrote the dialogues and made the music, while Rémi established the aesthetic and did the visual part.
